member.name: M:WikiTree_Bio_Formatter_Desktop.ProfileSetupDialog.SaveID(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Saves the profile ID entered and stores the required password details if required to do so.
member.remarks: The email and password are always saved if they were not already stored. Optionally these can be stored for future use.

member.name: M:WikiTree_Bio_Formatter_Desktop.WTBRoutines.FormatDateString(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Routine to format a date
member.param: The index number of the combo box
The index number of the combo box
member.returns: Returns a formatted date string as a string value
member.remarks: The incoming date is always in Asian format
